content.description:
Sit start matched on an undercling that points down and right. Make a big move with the right hand to a decent hold. Work into the flake and then left to match the undercling rail on

Crime

. Finish

Crime

.

It is contrived, yes, but the moves are awesome and the rock is amazing.
content.location:
Do a low right sds for

Crime

.

content.description: The crux is matching up on the two underclings and making a powerful move out left to a crimp.  I have fussed with a little bit of beta on this route and found that just high stepping with my right foot to the point on the feature in the cave is probably the best option for getting up as high as possible on the left hand undercling before falling in with the right.  Powerful!
content.protection: 2 pads.  Spotter to keep your back off the tree.
content.location:
The route begins as for

Against Humanity

low down in the cave on an undercling.

content.description:
Start as for

Dump Truck

. Once you gain the shield, instead of linking to

Crime

, top out as for

Against Humanity

.

Cross the river, walk downstream 20 yards passing a mini-cliff with several 15 foot problems. Arrive at the next boulder a little uphill and downstream from the minicliff but below

Gandolf

. Against Humanity takes the right line out a flake/sidepull. Finish with a big move right to a slopey hold followed by an easier but tall topout at the boulder's high point. This is one of the best.
